mapper.select: select d2.id depId, d2.dep_name depName from department d2 where not exists(select d2.id from department d1 where d2.id=d1.parent_id) and d2.is_del=0 and d2.is_outtage=0 and d2.is_show=0 and d2.company_id=#{companyId};

select count(1) from user u left join rel_dep_user rdu on u.id=rdu.user_id left join department d on d.id=rdu.dep_id where u.company_id=rdu.company_id and u.company_id=d.company_id and u.company_id=#{companyId} and u.is_del=0 and d.is_del=0 and d.id in
#{item}

select a1.id, a1.dep_name depName, a1.dep_manager depManager, a1.is_careerline isCareerLine, u2.user_name depManagerName, ifnull(d.id,'') superId, ifnull(d.dep_name,'') superName, ifnull(a3.childDepCount,0) childDepCount, ifnull(a4.childPosCount,0) childPosCount from department a1 left join department d on d.id=a1.parent_id left join user u2 on a1.dep_manager=u2.id left join ( select count(id) childDepCount, parent_id from department where company_id=#{companyId} and is_del=0 group by parent_id) a3 on a3.parent_id = a1.id left join ( select d1.id, d1.dep_name, count(1) childPosCount from department d1 left join rel_dep_user rdu on d1.id=rdu.dep_id left join user u on u.id=rdu.user_id where u.is_del=0 and u.is_show=0 and u.is_outtage=0 and d1.company_id=u.company_id and u.company_id=#{companyId} group by d1.id) a4 on a1.id=a4.id where a1.id=#{parentId} and a1.company_id=#{companyId} and a1.is_del=0;

select id from department where is_show=0 and is_outtage=0 and is_del=0
#{item}
SELECT COUNT(1) from department WHERE dep_name=#{depName} and is_del=0;
select d.id, d.dep_name depName from department d where d.is_careerline=1 and d.is_del=0 and d.is_outtage=0 and d.is_show=0 and d.company_id=1;

select d.id departmentId, d.dep_name departmentName from department d inner join rel_dep_user rdu on d.id=rdu.dep_id where rdu.user_id = #{userId} and d.is_del=0 and d.is_outtage=0 and d.is_show=0
and d.company_id=#{companyId}
